title: WP_Site
description: Core class used for interacting with a multisite site.

blog_id.description:
Site ID.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

site_id.description:
The ID of the site's parent network.

Named "site" vs. "network" for legacy reasons. An individual site's "site" is its network.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

registered.description: The date on which the site was created or registered.

last_updated.description: The date and time on which site settings were last updated.

public.description:
Whether the site should be treated as public.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

archived.description:
Whether the site should be treated as archived.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

mature.description:
Whether the site should be treated as mature.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

spam.description:
Whether the site should be treated as spam.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

deleted.description:
Whether the site should be treated as deleted.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

lang_id.description:
The language pack associated with this site.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.
